# Strata provides its own recipes
blacklist minecraft:cobblestone_slab
blacklist minecraft:cobblestone_wall
blacklist minecraft:stone_slab
blacklist minecraft:stone_stairs
blacklist minecraft:stonebrick
blacklist minecraft:mossy_cobblestone
blacklist minecraft:mossy_stonebrick
blacklist minecraft:stone_brick_stairs
blacklist minecraft:stone_brick_slab
blacklist minecraft:stone_button
blacklist minecraft:lever
blacklist minecraft:stone_pressure_plate

# Strata equivalent has vanillaOverride
blacklist minecraft:andesite
blacklist minecraft:diorite
blacklist minecraft:granite
